subject: Collaboration Proposal – Gaga Racing x Simsonn
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

My name is *Gaëtan Kurzawa*, and I am the creator of *Gaga Racing*, a
French-language YouTube channel dedicated to sim racing hardware and
immersive racing experiences.

I’ve been actively involved in the sim racing community for nearly two
years, and I’ve built a channel focused on *authentic product reviews*, *setup
showcases*, and *hands-on content* tailored to the needs of the growing
French-speaking sim racing community.
------------------------------
? About Gaga Racing

   -

   *1,300+ subscribers*
   -

   *150,000+ total views*
   -

   *9,500+ monthly views*
   -

   *1 video published every week*
   -

   Audience: French-speaking sim racers (ages 25–44)
   -

   YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@gaga_racing

------------------------------
? Why I’m Reaching Out

I’ve been following Simsonn’s range of products—especially your *Pro X and
Plus X pedals*, *shifters*, and *steering wheels*—with great interest. Your
mission to deliver professional-level gear at accessible prices truly
resonates with the sim racing community.

I would love to *collaborate* by reviewing one or more of your products on
my channel. My videos provide *in-depth, real-world testing*, with *transparent
and honest impressions*. Content is in French with optional English
subtitles, helping you reach a new segment of sim racers.
------------------------------
✅ What I Can Offer

   -

   A *dedicated review video* on YouTube
   -

   Short-form content on *Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts*
   -

   Optional *affiliate links* or *discount code* to drive engagement
   -

   Increased brand awareness in the French-speaking sim racing market

------------------------------
? What I Would Request

   -

   A *review sample* or loan of one or more products (e.g. pedals, steering
   wheel, or accessories)
   -

   Freedom to test and share *honest feedback*
   -

   Optional: affiliate/partnership opportunities

I would be delighted to showcase Simsonn’s hardware and help grow your
visibility in the French market. Please let me know if you’d be open to
discussing this further.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
*Gaëtan Kurzawa*
? gaetankurzawa@gmail.com
? youtube.com/@gaga_racing <https://www.youtube.com/@gaga_racing>

conversations.body_text: Hi Gaga Racing,  Alright, I’ll discuss with my team whether we can provide a sample. Could you please share which brands you’re currently working with, and how their exposure and sales performance have been?

Hi,

Thank you for getting back to me.

To answer your question, I currently collaborate mainly with *resellers
across Europe*, as I’m actively expanding my network to gain easier and
more consistent access to sim racing hardware for review purposes.

For example, I’ve been able to get equipment from *Simagic* through
*Simhub.pro*, with whom I have an ongoing partnership.
In *May alone*, this collaboration resulted in:

   -

   *38 completed orders*
   -

   Over *€11,000 in sales*
   -

   With *€652.86 in commissions* generated from my referral code
   -

   A *10% conversion rate* from referrals

I also work with *Simube*, where my audience has generated *34 sales*
totaling *$2,469.36 in revenue* (not commissions) so far.

Currently, I’m also in discussions with *VNM* and *Conspit* to test more
budget-friendly and efficient sim racing products. This type of gear tends
to resonate strongly with my audience, who are always on the lookout for
affordable and well-performing solutions.

Let me know if you'd like any additional data or insights. Thanks again for
your consideration, and I hope we can work together!

Best regards,
*Gaëtan Kurzawa*
Gaga Racing
? gaetankurzawa@gmail.com
? YouTube: @gaga_racing <https://www.youtube.com/@gaga_racing>

I look forward to hearing back from you after your internal discussions. In

*Gaëtan Kurzawa*

on my YouTube channel, *Gaga Racing*.

Let me know if your team had time to discuss the sample request, and if
there's anything else I can provide to help with the decision.

Looking forward to your response!

Best regards,
*Gaëtan Kurzawa*

Hi，Gaga Racing，    Which samples do you need? Please send me your specific requirements, and I’ll forward them to our team for follow-up.

Hi,

Thank you for getting back to me!

I’d be very interested in testing the Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal
with Haptic Reactor.

My goal would be to create a full in-depth review for my YouTube channel
Gaga Racing.

A long-term driving review and my honest feedback.

Promotion of your product to the French-speaking sim racing community,
which is currently very engaged and seeking high-performance but affordable
gear.


Let me know if you need any additional information — and thank you again
for considering this collaboration!

Best regards,
Gaëtan Kurzawa
? YouTube – Gaga Racing
? gaetankurzawa@gmail.com

Hi,

I hope you're doing well!

I just wanted to kindly follow up on my previous message regarding the *Simsonn
Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor*.

I’d still be very interested in testing it for a *dedicated in-depth review
on my YouTube channel, Gaga Racing*.
As mentioned, my content is tailored to a *French-speaking audience highly
engaged in sim racing*, always on the lookout for *affordable and
high-performance gear* — which makes your pedal a great fit.

Let me know if there’s any additional information I can provide, or if
there are any updates on your side.

Looking forward to your reply and thank you again for considering the
collaboration!

*Best regards,*
*Gaëtan Kurzawa*
? YouTube – Gaga Racing <https://www.youtube.com/@gaga_racing>
? gaetankurzawa@gmail.com
? www.gagaracing.fr

你好，Gaga Racing，  我们的团队成员 Jenny 应该已经联系您了。目前，我们可以为您提供 PlusX 的银色版本。在审核完您的视频质量后，我们会跟进推出 Ultra 版本。

Hi,

Thank you for your reply!

I haven’t been contacted by your colleague Jenny yet.
Could you kindly ask her to reach out again or share her contact details
with me?

I’m definitely interested in testing the silver version of the PlusX and I
would be happy to produce a high-quality review to potentially move forward
with the Ultra version later on.

Looking forward to your reply!

Best regards,
Gaëtan Kurzawa
? YouTube – Gaga Racing
? gaetankurzawa@gmail.com
